unit.doc: Common types used by other modules

type.doc: Fully qualified variables (ie. with the name of sections/sub-sections they appear in)
A map from variables to their contents (i.e an environment)

constructor.doc: The package doesn't require downloading to uninstall
The package is pervasive on all switches

module_type.doc: At some point we want to abstract so that the same functions can be used over CUDF and OPAM packages

type.doc: The solver answers a list of actions to perform
The possible causes of an action.

constructor.doc: List of successful actions, list of actions with errors, list of remaining undone actions
The subset of packages to upgrade

type.doc: Source file positions: filename, line, column
A file is composed of sections and variable definitions
A file is a list of items and the filename
